q: management shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. After a quiet fourth quarter, Allen Iverson settled for 48 points and leading Phil Jacksonadelphia to a 118-111 victory Tuesday night over the Bucks, who have been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star. 2011, 22:16 EST Google announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. It said the management changes would take effect on April 4.

at the top of the company." Larry Page , who founded the company with Sergey Brin will now run the company in the CEO role with Eric Schmidt moving to an "Executive Chairman" role. Larry Page will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly, says Eric Schmidt before adding: "I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry Page will be even better!
